amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Treasury to provide weekly reporting of extraordinary measures and projected exhaustion dates upon notification that the debt limit has been reached.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide weekly reporting of extraordinary measures and projected exhaustion date upon notification the debt limit has been reached.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Huelskamp.
